arabicText: وَٱلَّذِينَ يَرْمُونَ ٱلْمُحْصَنَـٰتِ ثُمَّ لَمْ يَأْتُوا۟ بِأَرْبَعَةِ شُهَدَآءَ فَٱجْلِدُوهُمْ ثَمَـٰنِينَ جَلْدَةًۭ وَلَا تَقْبَلُوا۟ لَهُمْ شَهَـٰدَةً أَبَدًۭا ۚ وَأُو۟لَـٰٓئِكَ هُمُ ٱلْفَـٰسِقُونَ
englishTranslationText:
And	those	who	accuse	chaste	women	and	
do	not	bring	four	witnesses	to	testify	-	
punish	them	with	eighty	lashes	and	do	
not	ever	accept	their	testimony;	and	it	is	
they	who	are	the	wicked.
romanUrduTranslationText:
Aur	jo	pārsā	auratoñ	ko	‘aib	lagāye	phir	
chār	(4)	gawāh	mu’āyenā	ke	na	lāyeiñ	to	
unheiñ	assi	(80)	kode	lagāo	aur	unki	koi	
gawāhi	kabhi	na	māno	aur	wohi	fāsiq	haiñ

arabicText: إِلَّا ٱلَّذِينَ تَابُوا۟ مِنۢ بَعْدِ ذَٰلِكَ وَأَصْلَحُوا۟ فَإِنَّ ٱللَّهَ غَفُورٌۭ رَّحِيمٌۭ
englishTranslationText:
Except	those	who	repent	after	this	and	
reform	themselves;	so	indeed	Allah	is	Oft	
Forgiving,	Most	Merciful.
romanUrduTranslationText:
Magar	jo	uske	b’ād	taubah	karleiñ	aur	
sañwar	jāyeiñ	to	be-shak	Allah	bakash	ne		
wāla	maherbān	hai

arabicText: وَٱلَّذِينَ يَرْمُونَ أَزْوَٰجَهُمْ وَلَمْ يَكُن لَّهُمْ شُهَدَآءُ إِلَّآ أَنفُسُهُمْ فَشَهَـٰدَةُ أَحَدِهِمْ أَرْبَعُ شَهَـٰدَٰتٍۭ بِٱللَّهِ ۙ إِنَّهُۥ لَمِنَ ٱلصَّـٰدِقِينَ
englishTranslationText:
And	those	who	accuse	their	wives	and	do	
not	have	witnesses	except	their	own	
statements	–	for	such	the	testimony	is	
that	he	bear	the	testimony	four	times	by	the	name	of	Allah	that	he	is	truthful.
romanUrduTranslationText:
Aur	woh	jo	apni	auratoñ	ko	‘aib	lagāyeiñ	
aur	unke	pās	apne	bayān	ke	siwā	gawāh	
na	hoñ	to	aise	kisi	ki	gawāhi	yeh	hai	ke	
chār	(4)	bār	gawāhi	de	Allah	ke	nām	se	ke	woh	sacchā	hai

arabicText: وَٱلْخَـٰمِسَةُ أَنَّ لَعْنَتَ ٱللَّهِ عَلَيْهِ إِن كَانَ مِنَ ٱلْكَـٰذِبِينَ
englishTranslationText: And	the	fifth	time,	that	the	curse	of	Allah	be	upon	him	if	he	is	a	liar.
romanUrduTranslationText: Aur	pāñchwiñ	yeh	ke	Allah	ki	l’ānat	ho	uspar	agar	jhootā	ho

arabicText: وَيَدْرَؤُا۟ عَنْهَا ٱلْعَذَابَ أَن تَشْهَدَ أَرْبَعَ شَهَـٰدَٰتٍۭ بِٱللَّهِ ۙ إِنَّهُۥ لَمِنَ ٱلْكَـٰذِبِينَ
englishTranslationText:
And	the	punishment	shall	be	averted	from	the	woman	if	she	bears	the	testimony	four	times	by	
the	name	of	Allah,	that	the	man	is	a	liar.
romanUrduTranslationText:
.Aur	aurat	se	yuñ	sazā	tal	jayegi	ke	woh	Allah	ka	nām	lekar	chār	(4)	bār	gawāhi	de	ke	mard	jhootā	
hai.

arabicText: وَٱلْخَـٰمِسَةَ أَنَّ غَضَبَ ٱللَّهِ عَلَيْهَآ إِن كَانَ مِنَ ٱلصَّـٰدِقِينَ
englishTranslationText: And	the	fifth	time,	that	the	wrath	of	Allah	be	upon	her	if	the	man	is	truthful.
romanUrduTranslationText: Aur	pāñchwiñ	yuñ	ke	aurat	par	gazab	Allah	ka	agar	mard	sacchā	ho

arabicText: وَلَوْلَا فَضْلُ ٱللَّهِ عَلَيْكُمْ وَرَحْمَتُهُۥ وَأَنَّ ٱللَّهَ تَوَّابٌ حَكِيمٌ
englishTranslationText:
And	were	it	not	for	Allah’s	munificence	and	His	mercy	upon	you	and	that	Allah	is	the	Acceptor	
of	Repentance,	the	Wise	–	He	would	then	have	unveiled	you.
romanUrduTranslationText:
Aur	agar	Allah	ka	fazl	aur	uski	Rehmat	
tumpar	na	hoti	aur	yeh	ke	Allah	taubah	
Qubool	farmāta	hikmat		wāla	hai.

arabicText: إِنَّ ٱلَّذِينَ جَآءُو بِٱلْإِفْكِ عُصْبَةٌۭ مِّنكُمْ ۚ لَا تَحْسَبُوهُ شَرًّۭا لَّكُم ۖ بَلْ هُوَ خَيْرٌۭ لَّكُمْ ۚ لِكُلِّ ٱمْرِئٍۢ مِّنْهُم مَّا ٱكْتَسَبَ مِنَ ٱلْإِثْمِ ۚ وَٱلَّذِى تَوَلَّىٰ كِبْرَهُۥ مِنْهُمْ لَهُۥ عَذَابٌ عَظِيمٌۭ
englishTranslationText:
Indeed	those	who	have	brought	this	great	
accusation	are	a	group	from	among	you;	
do	not	consider	it	bad	for	you;	on	the	
contrary,	it	is	good	for	you;	for	each	man	
among	them	is	the	sin	that	he	has	earned;	
and	for	the	one	among	them	who	played	
the	greatest	part	in	it	–	for	him	is	a	
terrible	punishment.
romanUrduTranslationText:
To	tumhārā	pardah	khol	detā	be-shak	woh	ke	
yeh	badā	bohtān	laye	haiñ	tumhiñ	meiñ	ki	ek	
jam’āt	hai,	use	apne	liye	burā	na	samjho	
balke	woh	tumhāre	liye	behtar	hai	un	meiñ	
har	shakhs	ke	liye	woh	Gunāh	hai	jo	usne	
kamāyā	aur	un	meiñ	woh	jisne	sabse	badā	
hissa	liyā	uske	liye	badā	ázāb	hai

arabicText: لَّوْلَآ إِذْ سَمِعْتُمُوهُ ظَنَّ ٱلْمُؤْمِنُونَ وَٱلْمُؤْمِنَـٰتُ بِأَنفُسِهِمْ خَيْرًۭا وَقَالُوا۟ هَـٰذَآ إِفْكٌۭ مُّبِينٌۭ
englishTranslationText:
Why	was	it	not	that	the	believing	men	and	
women,	when	you	heard	it,	thought	good	
of	their	own	people,	and	had	said,	“This	is	
a	clear	accusation”?
romanUrduTranslationText:
Kyuñ	na	hua	jab	tum	ne	usey	sunā	thā	ke	
Musalmān	mardoñ	aur	Musalmān	aurtoñ	ne	
apnoñ	par	nek	gumān	kiya	hotā	aur	kahte	
yeh	khulā	bohtān	hai

arabicText: لَّوْلَا جَآءُو عَلَيْهِ بِأَرْبَعَةِ شُهَدَآءَ ۚ فَإِذْ لَمْ يَأْتُوا۟ بِٱلشُّهَدَآءِ فَأُو۟لَـٰٓئِكَ عِندَ ٱللَّهِ هُمُ ٱلْكَـٰذِبُونَ
englishTranslationText:
Why	did	they	not	bring	four	witnesses	
upon	it?	Since	they	did	not	bring	
witnesses,	they	themselves	are	liars	
before	Allah.
romanUrduTranslationText:
.Ispar	chār	(4)	gawāh	kyuñ	na	lāye	to	jab	
gawāh	na	lāye	to	wohi	Allah	ke	nazdeek	jhute	
haiñ	.

arabicText: وَلَوْلَا فَضْلُ ٱللَّهِ عَلَيْكُمْ وَرَحْمَتُهُۥ فِى ٱلدُّنْيَا وَٱلْـَٔاخِرَةِ لَمَسَّكُمْ فِى مَآ أَفَضْتُمْ فِيهِ عَذَابٌ عَظِيمٌ
englishTranslationText:
And	were	it	not	for	Allah’s	munificence	
and	His	mercy	upon	you	in	the	world	and	
in	the	Hereafter,	a	terrible	punishment	
would	have	reached	you	for	the	
discussions	you	fell	into.
romanUrduTranslationText:
Aur	agar	Allah	ka	fazl	aur	Uski	rahmat	tum	
par	duniyā	aur	āakhirat	meiñ	na	hoti	to	jis	
charche	meiñ	tum	pade	us	par	tumheiñ	badā	
ázāb	pahuñchtā

arabicText: إِذْ تَلَقَّوْنَهُۥ بِأَلْسِنَتِكُمْ وَتَقُولُونَ بِأَفْوَاهِكُم مَّا لَيْسَ لَكُم بِهِۦ عِلْمٌۭ وَتَحْسَبُونَهُۥ هَيِّنًۭا وَهُوَ عِندَ ٱللَّهِ عَظِيمٌۭ ١٥
englishTranslationText:
When	you	rumoured	with	your	tongues	
after	hearing	such	matters,	and	uttered	
with	your	mouths	about	which	you	had	
no	knowledge,	and	you	considered	it	
light;	and	that,	in	the	sight	of	Allah,	is	very	
great.
romanUrduTranslationText:
Jab	tum	aisi	bāt	apne	zabānoñ	par	ek	dusre	
se	sunkar	lāte	the	aur	apne	muñh	se	woh	
nikālte	the	jiskā	tumheiñ	‘Ilm	nahiñ	aur	usey	
sahal	samjhte	the	aur	woh	Allah	ke	nazdeek	
badi	bāt	hai

arabicText: وَلَوْلَآ إِذْ سَمِعْتُمُوهُ قُلْتُم مَّا يَكُونُ لَنَآ أَن نَّتَكَلَّمَ بِهَـٰذَا سُبْحَـٰنَكَ هَـٰذَا بُهْتَـٰنٌ عَظِيمٌۭ
englishTranslationText:
And	why	was	it	not	that,	when	you	heard	
it,	you	would	have	said,	“It	does	not	befit	
us	to	speak	regarding	this;	Purity	is	to	
You,	O	Allah	–	this	is	a	great	accusation.”
romanUrduTranslationText:
Aur	kyuñ	na	huā	jab	tumne	sunā	thā	kahā	
hotā	ke	hameiñ	nahiñ	pahuñchtā	ke	aisi	bāt	
kaheiñ,	ilāhi	pāki	hai	tujhe	yeh	badā	bohtān	
hai.

arabicText: يَعِظُكُمُ ٱللَّهُ أَن تَعُودُوا۟ لِمِثْلِهِۦٓ أَبَدًا إِن كُنتُم مُّؤْمِنِينَ
englishTranslationText: Allah	advises	you	never	to	speak	like	this	again,	if	you	have	faith.		”
romanUrduTranslationText: .Allah	tumheiñ	naseehat	farmātā	hai	ke	ab	kabhi	aisā	na	kahnā	agar	Imān	rakhte	ho?

arabicText: وَيُبَيِّنُ ٱللَّهُ لَكُمُ ٱلْـَٔايَـٰتِ ۚ وَٱللَّهُ عَلِيمٌ حَكِيمٌ
englishTranslationText: And	Allah	clearly	explains	the	verses	for	you;	and	Allah	is	All	Knowing,	Wise.
romanUrduTranslationText: .Aur	Allah	tumhāre	liye	Āyateiñ	sāf	bayān	farmātā	hai	aur	Allah	‘Ilm-o-hikmat		wāla	hai

arabicText: إِنَّ ٱلَّذِينَ يُحِبُّونَ أَن تَشِيعَ ٱلْفَـٰحِشَةُ فِى ٱلَّذِينَ ءَامَنُوا۟ لَهُمْ عَذَابٌ أَلِيمٌۭ فِى ٱلدُّنْيَا وَٱلْـَٔاخِرَةِ ۚ وَٱللَّهُ يَعْلَمُ وَأَنتُمْ لَا تَعْلَمُونَ
englishTranslationText:
Indeed	those	who	wish	that	slander	should	spread	among	the	Muslims	–	for	them	is	a	painful	
punishment	in	this	world	and	in	the	Hereafter;	and	Allah	knows,	and	you	do	not	know.
romanUrduTranslationText:
.Woh	log	jo	chāhte	haiñ	ke	Musalmānoñ	meiñ	burā	charchā	phaile	Unke	liye	dard-nāk	‘aƶāb	hai	duniyā	
aur	āakhirat	meiñ	aur	Allah	jānta	hai	aur	tum	nahiñ	jānte

arabicText: وَلَوْلَا فَضْلُ ٱللَّهِ عَلَيْكُمْ وَرَحْمَتُهُۥ وَأَنَّ ٱللَّهَ رَءُوفٌۭ رَّحِيمٌۭ
englishTranslationText:
And	were	it	not	for	Allah’s	munificence	and	His	mercy	upon	you,	and	that	Allah	is	Forgiving,	
Most	Merciful	-	you	would	have	tasted	its	outcome.
romanUrduTranslationText:
Aur	agar	Allah	ka	fazl	aur	uski	Rahmat	tum	par	na	hoti	aur	yeh	ke	Allah	tumpar	nihāyat	maherbān	
mehar		wāla	hai	to	tum	iskā	mazā	chakhte.

arabicText: ۞ يَـٰٓأَيُّهَا ٱلَّذِينَ ءَامَنُوا۟ لَا تَتَّبِعُوا۟ خُطُوَٰتِ ٱلشَّيْطَـٰنِ ۚ وَمَن يَتَّبِعْ خُطُوَٰتِ ٱلشَّيْطَـٰنِ فَإِنَّهُۥ يَأْمُرُ بِٱلْفَحْشَآءِ وَٱلْمُنكَرِ ۚ وَلَوْلَا فَضْلُ ٱللَّهِ عَلَيْكُمْ وَرَحْمَتُهُۥ مَا زَكَىٰ مِنكُم مِّنْ أَحَدٍ أَبَدًۭا وَلَـٰكِنَّ ٱللَّهَ يُزَكِّى مَن يَشَآءُ ۗ وَٱللَّهُ سَمِيعٌ عَلِيمٌۭ
englishTranslationText:
O	People	who	Believe!	Do	not	follow	the	
footsteps	of	the	devil;	and	whoever	
follows	the	footsteps	of	the	devil	–	so	he	
will	only	bid	the	indecent	and	the	evil;	
and	were	it	not	for	Allah’s	munificence	
and	His	mercy	upon	you,	none	of	you	
would	ever	become	pure	–	but	Allah	
purifies	whomever	He	wills;	and	Allah	is	
All	Hearing,	All	Knowing.
romanUrduTranslationText:
Aye	Imān	wālo!	Shaitān	ke	qadmoñ	par	na	
chalo	aur	jo	shaitān	ke	qadmoñ	par	chale	
to	woh	to	be-hayāi	aur	buri	hi	bāt	batāyegā	
aur	agar	Allah	ka	fazl	aur	uski	rahmat	tum	
par	na	hoti	to	tum	meiñ	Koi	bhi	kabhi	
suthrā	na	ho	saktā,	hāñ!	Allah	suthrā	
kardetā	hai	jise	chāhe	aur	Allah	suntā	jānta	
hai.

arabicText: وَلَا يَأْتَلِ أُو۟لُوا۟ ٱلْفَضْلِ مِنكُمْ وَٱلسَّعَةِ أَن يُؤْتُوٓا۟ أُو۟لِى ٱلْقُرْبَىٰ وَٱلْمَسَـٰكِينَ وَٱلْمُهَـٰجِرِينَ فِى سَبِيلِ ٱللَّهِ ۖ وَلْيَعْفُوا۟ وَلْيَصْفَحُوٓا۟ ۗ أَلَا تُحِبُّونَ أَن يَغْفِرَ ٱللَّهُ لَكُمْ ۗ وَٱللَّهُ غَفُورٌۭ رَّحِيمٌ
englishTranslationText:
And	may	not	those	who	possess	
superiority	(in	wealth)	among	you	and	
possess	capacity,	swear	not	to	give	to	the	
relatives	and	to	the	needy,	and	to	
immigrants	in	Allah's	cause;	and	they	
should	forgive	and	forbear;	do	you	not	
like	that	Allah	may	forgive	you?	And	Allah	
is	Oft	Forgiving,	Most	Merciful.
romanUrduTranslationText:
.Aur	Qasam	na	khāyeiñ	woh	jo	tum	meiñ	
fazilat	wāle	aur	gunjāish	wāle	haiñ		
qarābat	wāloñ	aur	miskeenoñ	aur	Allah	ke	
rāh	meiñ	hijrat	karne	wāloñ	ko	dene	ki	aur	
chāhiye	ke	muāf	kareiñ	aur	dar-guzareiñ	
Kyā	tum	isey	dost	nahiñ	rakhte	ke	Allah	
tumhāri	bakhshish	kare	aur	Allah	bakhsh	
ne		wāla	maherbān	hai

arabicText: إِنَّ ٱلَّذِينَ يَرْمُونَ ٱلْمُحْصَنَـٰتِ ٱلْغَـٰفِلَـٰتِ ٱلْمُؤْمِنَـٰتِ لُعِنُوا۟ فِى ٱلدُّنْيَا وَٱلْـَٔاخِرَةِ وَلَهُمْ عَذَابٌ عَظِيمٌۭ
englishTranslationText:
Indeed	those	who	accuse	the	innocent	
virtuous,	believing	women	–	upon	them	is	
a	curse	in	this	world	and	in	the	Hereafter;	
and	for	them	is	a	terrible	punishment.
romanUrduTranslationText:
Beshak	woh	jo	‘aib	lagāte	haiñ	anjān	pārsā	
imān	wāliyoñ	ko	unpar	l’anat	hai	duniyā	
aur	ākhirat	meiñ	aur	unke	liye	badā	‘aƶāb	
hai

arabicText: يَوْمَ تَشْهَدُ عَلَيْهِمْ أَلْسِنَتُهُمْ وَأَيْدِيهِمْ وَأَرْجُلُهُم بِمَا كَانُوا۟ يَعْمَلُونَ
englishTranslationText:
On	the	day	when	their	tongues	and	their	
hands	and	their	feet	will	testify	against	
them,	regarding	what	they	used	to	do.
romanUrduTranslationText:
Jis	din	unpar	gawāhi	deñgi	unki	zabāneiñ	
aur	unke	hāth	aur	Unke	pāoñ	jo	kuchh	
karte	the

arabicText: يَوْمَئِذٍۢ يُوَفِّيهِمُ ٱللَّهُ دِينَهُمُ ٱلْحَقَّ وَيَعْلَمُونَ أَنَّ ٱللَّهَ هُوَ ٱلْحَقُّ ٱلْمُبِينُ
englishTranslationText:
On	that	day	Allah	will	give	them	their	true	
punishment,	and	they	will	know	that	
Allah	only	is	the	Clear	Truth.
romanUrduTranslationText:
.Us	din	Allah	unheiñ	unki	Sachchi	sazā	puri	
degā	aur	jān	leñge	ke	Allah	hi	sareeh	Haq	
hai

arabicText: ٱلْخَبِيثَـٰتُ لِلْخَبِيثِينَ وَٱلْخَبِيثُونَ لِلْخَبِيثَـٰتِ ۖ وَٱلطَّيِّبَـٰتُ لِلطَّيِّبِينَ وَٱلطَّيِّبُونَ لِلطَّيِّبَـٰتِ ۚ أُو۟لَـٰٓئِكَ مُبَرَّءُونَ مِمَّا يَقُولُونَ ۖ لَهُم مَّغْفِرَةٌۭ وَرِزْقٌۭ كَرِيمٌۭ
englishTranslationText:
Vile	women	for	vile	men,	and	vile	men	for	
vile	women;	and	virtuous	women	for	
virtuous	men,	and	virtuous	men	for	
virtuous	women;	such	are	innocent	of	what	these	people	say;	for	them	are	forgiveness,	and	an	
honourable	sustenance.
romanUrduTranslationText:
Gandiyāñ	gandoñ	ke	liye	aur	gande	gandiyoñ	ke	liye,	aur	suthriyāñ	suthroñ	ke	liye	aur	suthre	
suthriyoñ	ke	liye	woh	pāk	haiñ	un	bātoñ	se	jo	yeh	kah	rahe	haiñ	unke	liye	bakhshish	aur	izzat	ki	
rozi	hai

arabicText: يَـٰٓأَيُّهَا ٱلَّذِينَ ءَامَنُوا۟ لَا تَدْخُلُوا۟ بُيُوتًا غَيْرَ بُيُوتِكُمْ حَتَّىٰ تَسْتَأْنِسُوا۟ وَتُسَلِّمُوا۟ عَلَىٰٓ أَهْلِهَا ۚ ذَٰلِكُمْ خَيْرٌۭ لَّكُمْ لَعَلَّكُمْ تَذَكَّرُونَ
englishTranslationText:
O	People	who	Believe!	Do	not	enter	the	houses	except	your	own	until	you	obtain	permission	
and	have	conveyed	peace	upon	its	inhabitants;	this	is	better	for	you,	in	order	that	you	may	
ponder.
romanUrduTranslationText:
Aye	Imān	wālo!	Apne	gharoñ	ke	siwā	aur	gharoñ	meiñ	na	jāo	jab	tak	ijāzat	na	lelo	aur	unke	
sākeenoñ	par	Salām	na	karlo	yeh	tumhāre	liye	behtar	hai	ke	tum	dhiyān	karo

arabicText: فَإِن لَّمْ تَجِدُوا۟ فِيهَآ أَحَدًۭا فَلَا تَدْخُلُوهَا حَتَّىٰ يُؤْذَنَ لَكُمْ ۖ وَإِن قِيلَ لَكُمُ ٱرْجِعُوا۟ فَٱرْجِعُوا۟ ۖ هُوَ أَزْكَىٰ لَكُمْ ۚ وَٱللَّهُ بِمَا تَعْمَلُونَ عَلِيمٌۭ
englishTranslationText:
And	if	you	do	not	find	anyone	in	them,	
even	then	do	not	enter	without	the	
permission	of	their	owners;	and	if	it	is	
said	to	you,	“Go	away”	then	go	away	–	this	
is	much	purer	for	you;	and	Allah	knows	
your	deeds.
romanUrduTranslationText:
Phir	agar	un	meiñ	kisi	ko	na	pāo	jab	bhi	be
mālikoñ	ki	ijāzat	ke	un	meiñ	na	jāo	aur	agar	
tum	se	kahā	jāye	ke	wāpas	jāo	to	wāpas	ho	
yeh	tumhāre	liye	bahut	suthrā	hai	Allah	
tumhāre	kāmoñ	ko	jānta	hai

arabicText: لَّيْسَ عَلَيْكُمْ جُنَاحٌ أَن تَدْخُلُوا۟ بُيُوتًا غَيْرَ مَسْكُونَةٍۢ فِيهَا مَتَـٰعٌۭ لَّكُمْ ۚ وَٱللَّهُ يَعْلَمُ مَا تُبْدُونَ وَمَا تَكْتُمُونَ
englishTranslationText:
There	is	no	sin	upon	you	to	enter	houses	
not	made	especially	for	someone’s	
habitation,	and	you	have	permission	for	
its	use;	and	Allah	knows	what	you	
disclose	and	what	you	hide.
romanUrduTranslationText:
Is	meiñ	tumpar	kuchh	gunāh	nahiñ	ke	un	
gharoñ	meiñ	jāo	jo	khās	kisi	ki	sukoonat	ke	
nahiñ	aur	unke	baratne	ka	tumheiñ	
ikhtiyār	hai	aur	Allah	jānta	hai	jo	tum	zāhir	
karte	ho	aur	jo	tum	chupāte	ho

arabicText: قُل لِّلْمُؤْمِنِينَ يَغُضُّوا۟ مِنْ أَبْصَـٰرِهِمْ وَيَحْفَظُوا۟ فُرُوجَهُمْ ۚ ذَٰلِكَ أَزْكَىٰ لَهُمْ ۗ إِنَّ ٱللَّهَ خَبِيرٌۢ بِمَا يَصْنَعُونَ
englishTranslationText:
Command	the	Muslim	men	to	keep	their	
gaze	low	and	to	protect	their	private	
organs;	that	is	much	purer	for	them;	
indeed	Allah	is	Aware	of	their	deeds.
romanUrduTranslationText:
Musalmān	mardoñ	ko	ḥukmdo	apni	
nigāheiñ	kuchh	nichi	rakheiñ	aur	apni	
sharamgāhoñ	ki	hifāzat	kareiñ	yeh	unke	
liye	bahut	suthrā	hai	be-shak	Allah	ko	unke	
kāmoñ	ki	khabar	hai.

arabicText: وَقُل لِّلْمُؤْمِنَـٰتِ يَغْضُضْنَ مِنْ أَبْصَـٰرِهِنَّ وَيَحْفَظْنَ فُرُوجَهُنَّ وَلَا يُبْدِينَ زِينَتَهُنَّ إِلَّا مَا ظَهَرَ مِنْهَا ۖ وَلْيَضْرِبْنَ بِخُمُرِهِنَّ عَلَىٰ جُيُوبِهِنَّ ۖ وَلَا يُبْدِينَ زِينَتَهُنَّ إِلَّا لِبُعُولَتِهِنَّ أَوْ ءَابَآئِهِنَّ أَوْ ءَابَآءِ بُعُولَتِهِنَّ أَوْ أَبْنَآئِهِنَّ أَوْ أَبْنَآءِ بُعُولَتِهِنَّ أَوْ إِخْوَٰنِهِنَّ أَوْ بَنِىٓ إِخْوَٰنِهِنَّ أَوْ بَنِىٓ أَخَوَٰتِهِنَّ أَوْ نِسَآئِهِنَّ أَوْ مَا مَلَكَتْ أَيْمَـٰنُهُنَّ أَوِ ٱلتَّـٰبِعِينَ غَيْرِ أُو۟لِى ٱلْإِرْبَةِ مِنَ ٱلرِّجَالِ أَوِ ٱلطِّفْلِ ٱلَّذِينَ لَمْ يَظْهَرُوا۟ عَلَىٰ عَوْرَٰتِ ٱلنِّسَآءِ ۖ وَلَا يَضْرِبْنَ بِأَرْجُلِهِنَّ لِيُعْلَمَ مَا يُخْفِينَ مِن زِينَتِهِنَّ ۚ وَتُوبُوٓا۟ إِلَى ٱللَّهِ جَمِيعًا أَيُّهَ ٱلْمُؤْمِنُونَ لَعَلَّكُمْ تُفْلِحُونَ
englishTranslationText:
And	command	the	Muslim	women	to	keep	
their	gaze	low	and	to	protect	their	
chastity,	and	not	to	reveal	their	
adornment	except	what	is	apparent,	and	
to	keep	the	cover	wrapped	over	their	
bosoms;	and	not	to	reveal	their	
adornment	except	to	their	own	husbands	
or	fathers	or	husbands’	fathers,	or	their	
sons	or	their	husbands’	sons,	or	their	
brothers	or	their	brothers’	sons	or	sisters’	
sons,	or	women	of	their	religion,	or	the	
bondwomen	they	possess,	or	male	servants	provided	they	do	not	have	manliness,	or	such	
children	who	do	not	know	of	women’s	nakedness,	and	not	to	stamp	their	feet	on	the	ground	in	
order	that	their	hidden	adornment	be	known;	and	O	Muslims,	all	of	you	turn	in	repentance	
together	towards	Allah,	in	the	hope	of	attaining	success.	(It	is	incumbent	upon	women	to	cover	
themselves	properly.)
romanUrduTranslationText:
Aur	Musalmān	aurtoñ	ko	ḥukmdo	apni	
nigāheiñ	kuchh	nichi	rakheiñ	aur	apni	
pārsāyi	ki	hifāzat	kareiñ	aur	apnā	banāo	na	dikhāyeiñ	magar	jitnā	khud	hi	zāhir	hai	aur	Dopatte	
apni	girebānoñ	par	dāle	raheiñ	aur	apnā	singār	zāhir	na	kareiñ	magar	apne	shoharoñ	par	yā	apne	
bāp	yā	shoharoñ	ke	bāp	yā	apne	bete	yā	shoharoñ	ke	bete	yā	apne	bhāyi	yā	bhatije	yā	apne	bhānje	
yā	apne	Deen	ki	aurateiñ	yā	apni	kaneezeiñ	jo	apne	hāth	ki	milk	hoñ	yā	naukar	basharte	ki	
shahwat	wāle	mard	na	hoñ	yā	woh	bachche	jinheiñ	auratoñ	ki	sharm	ki	cheezoñ	ki	khabar	nahiñ	
aur	zameen	par	pāoñ	zor	se	na	rakheiñ	ke	jānā	jāye	unkā	chupā	huā	singār	aur	Allah	ki	taraf	
taubah	karo	aye	Musalmānoñ	sab	ke	sab	is	ummeed	par	ke	tum	falāh	pāo.

arabicText: وَأَنكِحُوا۟ ٱلْأَيَـٰمَىٰ مِنكُمْ وَٱلصَّـٰلِحِينَ مِنْ عِبَادِكُمْ وَإِمَآئِكُمْ ۚ إِن يَكُونُوا۟ فُقَرَآءَ يُغْنِهِمُ ٱللَّهُ مِن فَضْلِهِۦ ۗ وَٱللَّهُ وَٰسِعٌ عَلِيمٌۭ
englishTranslationText:
And	enjoin	in	marriage	those	among	you	
who	are	not	married,	and	your	deserving	
slaves	and	bondwomen;	if	they	are	poor,	
Allah	will	make	them	wealthy	by	His	
munificence;	and	Allah	is	Most	Capable,	
All	Knowing.
romanUrduTranslationText:
.Aur	Nikāh	karo	apnoñ	meiñ	unkā	jo	be
nikāh	ho	aur	apne	lāyeq	bandoñ	aur	
kaneezoñ	ka	agar	woh	faqeer	ho	to	Allah	
unheiñ	ghani	kardegā	Apne	fazl	ke	sabab	
aur	Allah	wus’at		wāla	‘Ilm		wāla	hai.

arabicText: وَلْيَسْتَعْفِفِ ٱلَّذِينَ لَا يَجِدُونَ نِكَاحًا حَتَّىٰ يُغْنِيَهُمُ ٱللَّهُ مِن فَضْلِهِۦ ۗ وَٱلَّذِينَ يَبْتَغُونَ ٱلْكِتَـٰبَ مِمَّا مَلَكَتْ أَيْمَـٰنُكُمْ فَكَاتِبُوهُمْ إِنْ عَلِمْتُمْ فِيهِمْ خَيْرًۭا ۖ وَءَاتُوهُم مِّن مَّالِ ٱللَّهِ ٱلَّذِىٓ ءَاتَىٰكُمْ ۚ وَلَا تُكْرِهُوا۟ فَتَيَـٰتِكُمْ عَلَى ٱلْبِغَآءِ إِنْ أَرَدْنَ تَحَصُّنًۭا لِّتَبْتَغُوا۟ عَرَضَ ٱلْحَيَوٰةِ ٱلدُّنْيَا ۚ وَمَن يُكْرِههُّنَّ فَإِنَّ ٱللَّهَ مِنۢ بَعْدِ إِكْرَٰهِهِنَّ غَفُورٌۭ رَّحِيمٌۭ
englishTranslationText:
And	those	who	do	not	have	the	means	to	
get	married	must	keep	chaste	till	Allah	
provides	them	the	resources	by	His	
munificence;	and	the	bondwomen	in	your	
possession	who,	in	order	to	earn	
something,	seek	a	letter	of	freedom	from	
you	–	then	write	it	for	them	if	you	
consider	some	goodness	in	them;	and	
help	them	in	their	cause	with	Allah’s	
wealth	which	He	has	bestowed	upon	you;	
and	do	not	force	your	bondwomen	into	
the	dirty	profession,	while	they	wish	to	
save	themselves,	in	order	to	earn	some	
riches	of	the	worldly	life;	and	if	one	forces	
them	then	indeed	Allah,	upon	their	
remaining	compelled,	is	Oft	Forgiving,	
Most	Merciful.
romanUrduTranslationText:
Chāhiye	ke	bache	raheiñ	woh	jo	nikāh	ka	
maqdoor	nahiñ	rakhte	yahāñ	tak	ke	Allah	
maqdoor	wāla	karde	apne	fazl	se	aur	
tumhāre	hāth	ki	milk	bāñdi	gulāmoñ	meiñ	
se	jo	yeh	chāheñ	ke	kuchh	māl	kamāne	ki	
shart	par	unheiñ	āzādi	likh	do	to	likh	do	
agar	un	meiñ	kuchh	bhalāyi	jāno	aur	ispar	
un	ki	madad	karo	Allah	ke	māl	se	jo	tumko	
diyā	aur	majboor	na	karo	apni	kaneezoñ	ko	
badkāri	par	jabke	woh	bachnā	chāheiñ	
take	tum	duniyāwi	zindagi	ka	kuchh	māl	
chāho	aur	jo	unheiñ	majboor	karegā	to	be
shak	Allah	b’ād	iske	ke	woh	majboori	hi	ki	
hālat	par	raheiñ	bakash	ne	wāla	maherbān	
hai.

arabicText: وَلَقَدْ أَنزَلْنَآ إِلَيْكُمْ ءَايَـٰتٍۢ مُّبَيِّنَـٰتٍۢ وَمَثَلًۭا مِّنَ ٱلَّذِينَ خَلَوْا۟ مِن قَبْلِكُمْ وَمَوْعِظَةًۭ لِّلْمُتَّقِينَ
englishTranslationText:
And	indeed	We	have	sent	down	towards	
you	clear	verses,	and	some	account	of	
those	who	preceded	you,	and	advice	for	
the	pious.
romanUrduTranslationText:
Aur	be-shak	Hamne	utāri	tumhāri	taraf	
raushan	Āayateiñ	aur	kuchh	un	logoñ	ka	
bayān	jo	tumse	pehle	ho	guzre	aur	dar	
wāloñ	ke	Liye	naseehat

arabicText: ۞ ٱللَّهُ نُورُ ٱلسَّمَـٰوَٰتِ وَٱلْأَرْضِ ۚ مَثَلُ نُورِهِۦ كَمِشْكَوٰةٍۢ فِيهَا مِصْبَاحٌ ۖ ٱلْمِصْبَاحُ فِى زُجَاجَةٍ ۖ ٱلزُّجَاجَةُ كَأَنَّهَا كَوْكَبٌۭ دُرِّىٌّۭ يُوقَدُ مِن شَجَرَةٍۢ مُّبَـٰرَكَةٍۢ زَيْتُونَةٍۢ لَّا شَرْقِيَّةٍۢ وَلَا غَرْبِيَّةٍۢ يَكَادُ زَيْتُهَا يُضِىٓءُ وَلَوْ لَمْ تَمْسَسْهُ نَارٌۭ ۚ نُّورٌ عَلَىٰ نُورٍۢ ۗ يَهْدِى ٱللَّهُ لِنُورِهِۦ مَن يَشَآءُ ۚ وَيَضْرِبُ ٱللَّهُ ٱلْأَمْثَـٰلَ لِلنَّاسِ ۗ وَٱللَّهُ بِكُلِّ شَىْءٍ عَلِيمٌۭ
englishTranslationText:
Allah	is	the	Light	of	the	heavens	and	the	
earth;	the	example	of	His	light	is	like	a	
niche	in	which	is	a	lamp;	the	lamp	is	in	a	
glass;	the	glass	is	as	if	it	were	a	star	shining	like	a	pearl,	kindled	by	the	blessed	olive	tree,	
neither	of	the	east	nor	of	the	west	–	it	is	close	that	the	oil	itself	get	ablaze	although	the	fire	does	
not	touch	it;	light	upon	light;	Allah	guides	towards	His	light	whomever	He	wills;	and	Allah	
illustrates	examples	for	mankind;	and	Allah	knows	everything.	(The	Holy	Prophet	is	a	light	from	
Allah)
romanUrduTranslationText:
Allah	Noor	hai	āasmanoñ	aur	zameen	ka	
uske	Noor	ki	misāl	aisi	jaise	ek	tāq	ke	us	meiñ	chirāgh	hai	woh	chirāgh	ek	fānoos	meiñ	hai	woh	
fānoos	goya	ek	sitārah	hai	moti	sā	chamaktā	raushan	hotā	barkat	wāle	perd	zaitoon	se	jo	na	
poorab	(Mashriq)	ka	na	pach-chim	(Maghrib)	ka	qareeb	hai	ke	uskā	tel	bhadak	uththe	agar	che	
usey	āag	na	chuwe	Noor	par	Noor	hai	Allah	Apne	Noor	ki	rāh	batātā	hai	jise	chāhtā	hai	aur	Allah	
misāleiñ	bayān	farmātā	hai	logoñ	ke	liye	aur	Allah	Sab	kuchh	jānta	hai.

arabicText: فِى بُيُوتٍ أَذِنَ ٱللَّهُ أَن تُرْفَعَ وَيُذْكَرَ فِيهَا ٱسْمُهُۥ يُسَبِّحُ لَهُۥ فِيهَا بِٱلْغُدُوِّ وَٱلْـَٔاصَالِ
englishTranslationText:
In	the	houses	(masjids)	which	Allah	has	commanded	to	erect	and	in	which	His	name	is	taken	–	
praising	Allah	in	them	at	morn	and	evening,
romanUrduTranslationText:
Un	gharoñ	meiñ	jinheiñ	buland	karne	ka	Allah	ne	ḥukm	diyā	hai	aur	un	meiñ	uskā	nām	liyā	jātā	
hai	Allah	ki	tasbeeh	karte	haiñ	un	meiñ	subah	aur	shām

arabicText: رِجَالٌۭ لَّا تُلْهِيهِمْ تِجَـٰرَةٌۭ وَلَا بَيْعٌ عَن ذِكْرِ ٱللَّهِ وَإِقَامِ ٱلصَّلَوٰةِ وَإِيتَآءِ ٱلزَّكَوٰةِ ۙ يَخَافُونَ يَوْمًۭا تَتَقَلَّبُ فِيهِ ٱلْقُلُوبُ وَٱلْأَبْصَـٰرُ
englishTranslationText:
(Are)	Those	men,	whom	neither	any	
bargain	nor	any	trade	distracts	from	the	
Remembrance	of	Allah	and	from	
establishing	the	prayer	and	from	paying	
the	charity	–	they	fear	the	day	when	the	
hearts	and	the	eyes	will	be	overturned.
romanUrduTranslationText:
Woh	mard	jinheiñ	gāfil	nahiñ	kartā	Koi	
saudā	aur	na	khareed-o-farokht	Allah	ki	
yād	aur	Namāz	barpā	rakhne	aur	Zakāt	
dene	se,	darte	haiñ	us	din	se	jis	meiñ	ulat	
jāyeñge	dil	aur	āañkheiñ	.

arabicText: لِيَجْزِيَهُمُ ٱللَّهُ أَحْسَنَ مَا عَمِلُوا۟ وَيَزِيدَهُم مِّن فَضْلِهِۦ ۗ وَٱللَّهُ يَرْزُقُ مَن يَشَآءُ بِغَيْرِ حِسَابٍۢ
englishTranslationText:
In	order	that	Allah	may	reward	them	for	
their	best	deeds	and	by	His	munificence,	
bestow	upon	them	an	increased	reward;	
and	Allah	gives	sustenance	to	whomever	
He	wills,	without	account.
romanUrduTranslationText:
Tāke	Allah	unheiñ	badla	de	unke	sabse	
behtar	kām	ka	aur	apne	fazl	se	unheiñ	
in’ām	ziyāda	de	aur	Allah	Rozi	detā	hai	jise	
chāhe	be	ginti

arabicText: وَٱلَّذِينَ كَفَرُوٓا۟ أَعْمَـٰلُهُمْ كَسَرَابٍۭ بِقِيعَةٍۢ يَحْسَبُهُ ٱلظَّمْـَٔانُ مَآءً حَتَّىٰٓ إِذَا جَآءَهُۥ لَمْ يَجِدْهُ شَيْـًۭٔا وَوَجَدَ ٱللَّهَ عِندَهُۥ فَوَفَّىٰهُ حِسَابَهُۥ ۗ وَٱللَّهُ سَرِيعُ ٱلْحِسَابِ
englishTranslationText:
And	those	who	disbelieved	-	their	deeds	
are	like	a	mirage	in	the	wasteland,	so	the	
thirsty	may	believe	it	to	be	water;	to	the	
extent	that	when	he	came	close	to	it,	he	
found	it	is	nothing	and	found	Allah	close	
to	him,	so	He	filled	his	account;	and	Allah	
is	Swift	At	Taking	Account.
romanUrduTranslationText:
Aur	jo	kāfir	huye	unke	kām	aise	haiñ	jaise	
dhoop	meiñ	chamaktā	retā	Kisi	jangal	
meiñ	ke	piyāsā	usey	pāni	samjhe	yahāñ	tak	
jab	uske	pās	āayā	to	usey	kuchh	na	pāyā	
aur	Allah	ko	Apne	Qareeb	pāyā	to	usne	
uskā	hisāb	poorā	bhar	diyā	aur	Allah	jald	
hisāb	kar	letā	hai.

arabicText: أَوْ كَظُلُمَـٰتٍۢ فِى بَحْرٍۢ لُّجِّىٍّۢ يَغْشَىٰهُ مَوْجٌۭ مِّن فَوْقِهِۦ مَوْجٌۭ مِّن فَوْقِهِۦ سَحَابٌۭ ۚ ظُلُمَـٰتٌۢ بَعْضُهَا فَوْقَ بَعْضٍ إِذَآ أَخْرَجَ يَدَهُۥ لَمْ يَكَدْ يَرَىٰهَا ۗ وَمَن لَّمْ يَجْعَلِ ٱللَّهُ لَهُۥ نُورًۭا فَمَا لَهُۥ مِن نُّورٍ
englishTranslationText:
Or	like	realms	of	darkness	on	a	deep	sea,	
which	is	covered	by	a	wave,	the	wave	
covered	by	another	wave,	and	above	it	is	a	
cloud;	layers	of	darkness	upon	darkness;	
if	he	removes	his	hand	it	does	not	seem	
visible;	and	the	one	to	whom	Allah	does	
not	provide	light	–	there	is	no	light	for	
him	anywhere.
romanUrduTranslationText:
Yā	jaise	andheriyāñ	kisi	kunde	ke	daryā	meiñ	uske	upar	mauj	mauj	ke	upar	mauj	uske	upar	bādal	
andhere	haiñ	ek	par	ek	jab	apnā	hāth	nikāle	to	sujhāyi	detā	m’āloom	na	ho	aur	jise	Allah	Noor	na	
de	uske	liye	kahiñ	Noor	nahiñ

arabicText: أَلَمْ تَرَ أَنَّ ٱللَّهَ يُسَبِّحُ لَهُۥ مَن فِى ٱلسَّمَـٰوَٰتِ وَٱلْأَرْضِ وَٱلطَّيْرُ صَـٰٓفَّـٰتٍۢ ۖ كُلٌّۭ قَدْ عَلِمَ صَلَاتَهُۥ وَتَسْبِيحَهُۥ ۗ وَٱللَّهُ عَلِيمٌۢ بِمَا يَفْعَلُونَ
englishTranslationText:
Have	you	not	seen	that	all	those	who	are	in	the	heavens	and	the	earth	praise	Allah,	and	the	
birds	with	their	wings	spread	(also	praise	Him)?	Each	one	has	learnt	its	prayers	and	its	words	of	
praise;	and	Allah	knows	their	deeds.
romanUrduTranslationText:
Kyā	tum	ne	na	dekhā	ke	Allah	ki	tasbeeh	karte	haiñ	jo	koi	āasmānoñ	aur	zameen	meiñ	haiñ	aur	
parinde	par	phailāye	sab	ne	jān	rakkhi	hai	apni	Namāz	aur	apni	Tasbeeh	aur	Allah	unke	kāmoñ	
ko	jānta	hai.

arabicText: وَلِلَّهِ مُلْكُ ٱلسَّمَـٰوَٰتِ وَٱلْأَرْضِ ۖ وَإِلَى ٱللَّهِ ٱلْمَصِيرُ
englishTranslationText: And	for	Allah	only	is	the	kingship	of	the	heavens	and	the	earth;	and	towards	Allah	is	the	return.
romanUrduTranslationText: .Aur	Allah	hi	ke	liye	hai	Saltanat	āasmānoñ	aur	zameen	ki	aur	Allah	hi	ki	taraf	phir	jānā

arabicText: أَلَمْ تَرَ أَنَّ ٱللَّهَ يُزْجِى سَحَابًۭا ثُمَّ يُؤَلِّفُ بَيْنَهُۥ ثُمَّ يَجْعَلُهُۥ رُكَامًۭا فَتَرَى ٱلْوَدْقَ يَخْرُجُ مِنْ خِلَـٰلِهِۦ وَيُنَزِّلُ مِنَ ٱلسَّمَآءِ مِن جِبَالٍۢ فِيهَا مِنۢ بَرَدٍۢ فَيُصِيبُ بِهِۦ مَن يَشَآءُ وَيَصْرِفُهُۥ عَن مَّن يَشَآءُ ۖ يَكَادُ سَنَا بَرْقِهِۦ يَذْهَبُ بِٱلْأَبْصَـٰرِ
englishTranslationText:
Have	you	not	seen	that	Allah	slowly	transports	the	clouds,	then	gathers	them	together,	then	
heaps	them	together,	so	you	see	the	rain	coming	forth	from	between	them?	And	from	the	sky	
He	sends	down	hail	from	the	mountains	of	ice,	then	sends	them	upon	whomever	He	wills,	and	
averts	them	from	whomever	He	wills;	it	is	close	that	the	flash	of	its	lightning	take	away	the	
eyesight.
romanUrduTranslationText:
.Kyā	toone	na	dekhā	ke	Allah	narm	narm	
chalātā	hai	bādal	ko	phir	unheiñ	āapas	meiñ	
milātā	hai	phir	unheiñ	teh	par	teh	kardetā	hai	
to	tu	dekhe	ke	uske	beech	meiñ	se	meñh	nikaltā	
hai	aur	utārtā	hai	āasmān	se	us	meiñ	jo	baraf	ke	
pahād	haiñ	un	meiñ	se	kuchh	oley	phir	dāltā	hai	
unheiñ	jispar	chāheiñ	aur	phir	detā	hai	unheiñ	
jispar	chāheiñ	qareeb	hai	ke	uski	bijli	ki	chamak	
āñkh	le	jaye	.

arabicText: يُقَلِّبُ ٱللَّهُ ٱلَّيْلَ وَٱلنَّهَارَ ۚ إِنَّ فِى ذَٰلِكَ لَعِبْرَةًۭ لِّأُو۟لِى ٱلْأَبْصَـٰرِ
romanUrduTranslationText:
.Allah	badli	kartā	hai	rāt	aur	din	ki	be-shak	is	
meiñ	samjhne	ka	maqām	hai	nigāh	wāloñ	ko

arabicText: وَٱللَّهُ خَلَقَ كُلَّ دَآبَّةٍۢ مِّن مَّآءٍۢ ۖ فَمِنْهُم مَّن يَمْشِى عَلَىٰ بَطْنِهِۦ وَمِنْهُم مَّن يَمْشِى عَلَىٰ رِجْلَيْنِ وَمِنْهُم مَّن يَمْشِى عَلَىٰٓ أَرْبَعٍۢ ۚ يَخْلُقُ ٱللَّهُ مَا يَشَآءُ ۚ إِنَّ ٱللَّهَ عَلَىٰ كُلِّ شَىْءٍۢ قَدِيرٌۭ
englishTranslationText:
And	Allah	created	every	animal	on	earth,	
from	water;	so	among	them	is	a	kind	that	
moves	upon	its	belly;	and	among	them	is	a	
kind	that	moves	upon	two	legs;	and	
among	them	a	kind	that	moves	upon	four	
legs;	Allah	creates	whatever	He	wills;	
indeed	Allah	is	Able	to	do	all	things.
romanUrduTranslationText:
.Aur	Allah	ne	zameen	par	har	chalne		wāla	pāni	
se	banāyā	to	un	meiñ	Koi	apne	pet	par	chaltā	hai	
aur	un	meiñ	koi	do	(2)	pāoñ	par	chaltā	hai	aur	
un	meiñ	koi	chār	(4)	pāoñ	par	chaltā	hai	Allah	
banātā	hai	jo	chāhe	be-shak	Allah	Sab	kuchh	kar	
saktā	hai.

arabicText: لَّقَدْ أَنزَلْنَآ ءَايَـٰتٍۢ مُّبَيِّنَـٰتٍۢ ۚ وَٱللَّهُ يَهْدِى مَن يَشَآءُ إِلَىٰ صِرَٰطٍۢ مُّسْتَقِيمٍۢ
romanUrduTranslationText:
Beshak	hamne	utāreiñ	sāf	bayān	karne	wāli	
Āayateiñ	aur	Allah	Hidāyat	deta	hai	jise	chāhe	
sidhi	rāh	dikhāye

arabicText: وَيَقُولُونَ ءَامَنَّا بِٱللَّهِ وَبِٱلرَّسُولِ وَأَطَعْنَا ثُمَّ يَتَوَلَّىٰ فَرِيقٌۭ مِّنْهُم مِّنۢ بَعْدِ ذَٰلِكَ ۚ وَمَآ أُو۟لَـٰٓئِكَ بِٱلْمُؤْمِنِينَ ٤٧
englishTranslationText:
And	they	say,	“We	have	accepted	faith	in	
Allah	and	His	Noble	Messenger,	and	we	
obey”;	then	after	that	a	group	among	them	
turns	away;	and	they	are	not	Muslims.
romanUrduTranslationText:
Aur	kehte	haiñ	ham	Imān	lāye	Allah	aur	Rasool	
par	aur	ḥukm	mānā	phir	kuchh	un	meiñ	ke	iske	
b’ad	phir	jāte	haiñ	aur	woh	Musalmān	nahiñ

arabicText: وَإِذَا دُعُوٓا۟ إِلَى ٱللَّهِ وَرَسُولِهِۦ لِيَحْكُمَ بَيْنَهُمْ إِذَا فَرِيقٌۭ مِّنْهُم مُّعْرِضُونَ
englishTranslationText:
And	when	called	towards	Allah	and	His	
Noble	Messenger	in	order	that	the	Noble	
Messenger	may	judge	between	them,	
thereupon	a	group	among	them	turns	
away.
romanUrduTranslationText:
.Aur	jab	bulāye	jāyeiñ	Allah	aur	uske	Rasool	ki	
taraf	ke	Rasool	un	meiñ	faisla	farmāye	to	jabhi	
unkā	ek	fareeq	muñh	pher	jātā	hai

arabicText: وَإِن يَكُن لَّهُمُ ٱلْحَقُّ يَأْتُوٓا۟ إِلَيْهِ مُذْعِنِينَ
englishTranslationText:
And	if	the	judgement	is	in	their	favour,	
they	come	towards	it	willingly.
romanUrduTranslationText:
Aur	agar	unki	digri	ho	(Unke	Haq	meiñ	faisla)	to	
uski	taraf	āayeiñ	mānte	huye

arabicText: أَفِى قُلُوبِهِم مَّرَضٌ أَمِ ٱرْتَابُوٓا۟ أَمْ يَخَافُونَ أَن يَحِيفَ ٱللَّهُ عَلَيْهِمْ وَرَسُولُهُۥ ۚ بَلْ أُو۟لَـٰٓئِكَ هُمُ ٱلظَّـٰلِمُونَ
englishTranslationText:
Are	their	hearts	diseased,	or	do	they	have	
doubts,	or	do	they	fear	that	Allah	and	His	
Noble	Messenger	will	oppress	them?	In	
fact	they	themselves	are	the	unjust.
romanUrduTranslationText:
Kyā	unke	dilon	meiñ	bimāri	hai	yā	shak	rakhte	
haiñ	ya	yeh	darte	haiñ	ke	Allah	wa	Rasool	unpar	
ƶulm	kareiñ	ge	balke	woh	khud	hi	ƶālim	haiñ

arabicText: إِنَّمَا كَانَ قَوْلَ ٱلْمُؤْمِنِينَ إِذَا دُعُوٓا۟ إِلَى ٱللَّهِ وَرَسُولِهِۦ لِيَحْكُمَ بَيْنَهُمْ أَن يَقُولُوا۟ سَمِعْنَا وَأَطَعْنَا ۚ وَأُو۟لَـٰٓئِكَ هُمُ ٱلْمُفْلِحُونَ
englishTranslationText:
The	saying	of	the	Muslims	when	they	are	
called	towards	Allah	and	His	Noble	
Messenger	in	order	that	the	Noble	
Messenger	judge	between	them	is	that	they	submit,	“We	hear	and	we	obey”;	and	it	is	they	who	
have	attained	the	goal.
romanUrduTranslationText:
Musalmānoñ	ki	bāt	to	yahi	hai	jab	Allah	aur	Rasool	ki	taraf	bulāye	jāyeiñ	ke	rasool	un	meiñ	faisla	farmāye	
ke	to	árz	kareiñ	hamne	sunā	aur	ḥukmmānā	aur	yahi	log	murād	ko	pahuñche

arabicText: وَمَن يُطِعِ ٱللَّهَ وَرَسُولَهُۥ وَيَخْشَ ٱللَّهَ وَيَتَّقْهِ فَأُو۟لَـٰٓئِكَ هُمُ ٱلْفَآئِزُونَ
englishTranslationText:
And	whoever	obeys	the	command	of	Allah	and	His	Noble	Messenger,	and	fears	Allah,	and	
practices	piety	-	so	it	is	they	who	are	the	successful.
romanUrduTranslationText: Aur	jo	ḥukm	māne	Allah	aur	uske	Rasool	ka	aur	Allah	se	dare	aur	parhez-gāri	kare	to	yahi	log	kāmiyāb	haiñ.

arabicText: ۞ وَأَقْسَمُوا۟ بِٱللَّهِ جَهْدَ أَيْمَـٰنِهِمْ لَئِنْ أَمَرْتَهُمْ لَيَخْرُجُنَّ ۖ قُل لَّا تُقْسِمُوا۟ ۖ طَاعَةٌۭ مَّعْرُوفَةٌ ۚ إِنَّ ٱللَّهَ خَبِيرٌۢ بِمَا تَعْمَلُونَ
englishTranslationText:
And	they	swore	by	Allah	most	vehemently	in	their	oaths	that	if	you	order	them,	they	will	go	forth	to	holy	
war;	say,	“Do	not	swear;	obedience	according	to	the	law	is	required;	indeed	Allah	knows	what	you	do.”
romanUrduTranslationText:
.Aur	unhoñ	ne	Allah	ki	qasm	khāyi	apne	halaf	meiñ	had	ki	koshish	se	ke	agar	tum	unheiñ	ḥukmdo	ge	to	woh	
zaroor	Jihād	ko	nikleiñ	ge	tum	farmāo	qasmeiñ	na	khāo		muwāfiq-e-	shar’ā	ḥukm	bardāri	chāhiye,	Allah	
jānta	hai	jo	tum	karte	ho.
